item.title: Giving staff( i need help how to give out)
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

iif u want as a commane - ::giveadmin

if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) {
            String name = command.substring(10);

            try {
                int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

                c.playerRights = 2;
                c.savemoreinfo();
                c.savechar();
                c.disconnected = true;
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");

Read full topic

item.title: Giving staff( i need help how to give out)
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Character Rights: 1 = Moderator, 2 = Admin, 3 = Co-Owner or Owner (No difference really).

Go into the character’s file and change their character-rights.

Read full topic
